title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/17/2021
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/17/2021
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress sit in for Dan Patrick and debate whether or not Trevor Lawrence can live up to the hype that has been placed upon him. Draymond Green took to the media to vent his frustrations about a double standard in the NBA but are the guys on the same page as him? Plus, the guys explain why the Steelers need to move on from Ben Roethlisberger and JuJu Smith-Schuster and speak with Bleacher Report's Eric Pincus about how the Lakers will fare without Anthony Davis!


Subscribe, rate and review Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress. Listen to the show LIVE on Fox Sports Radio Saturdays 1-3pm ET!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/up-on-game/id1542652485

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
